prompt_text: You arrive in the Star Destroyer's engineering bay. A reactor is overheating. Do you attempt to fix the issue, or ignore it and explore further?

passing_attributes.Hacking: You successfully stabilize the reactor, which opens access to the control room.
passing_attributes.Processing: You fix the issue with droid-like precision, opening access to the reactor core.

partial_pass_attributes.Intelligence: You slow down the overheating, but it's only temporary. You can either leave the area or rush to the control room for more permanent repairs.

fail.message: You fail to fix the reactor, causing an alarm that blocks access to other parts of the ship. Guards are headed your way!

prompt_text: You've entered the control room. You can access important systems here. Do you disable ship communications or attempt to scramble navigation systems?

passing_attributes.Hacking: You scramble the navigation systems, causing the Star Destroyer to drift off course.
passing_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You sense the right moment to disrupt communications, preventing them from sending distress signals.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You disable a few key systems with blaster fire, but you've made a lot of noise!

fail.message: Your attempt fails, and a squad of stormtroopers rushes in. You need to fight or flee!

prompt_text: You find yourself near the armory. Rows of weapons line the walls. Do you take weapons or set explosives?

passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You arm yourself with a powerful blaster, ready for combat ahead.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You set explosives on a delay, hoping to destroy this section of the ship later.

partial_pass_attributes.Strength: You manage to grab some weapons, but the area is now swarming with guards.

fail.message: You fail to arm yourself or set explosives before a security droid spots you. Combat is inevitable!

prompt_text: You've reached the detention block. A Rebel prisoner is being held here. Do you attempt a rescue, or leave and explore other parts of the ship?

passing_attributes.Mind Tricks: You use a Jedi mind trick to free the prisoner without alerting the guards.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You sneak past the guards and unlock the prisoner's cell.

partial_pass_attributes.Strength: You overpower a few guards but raise an alarm in the process.

fail.message: You are caught by guards, forcing you into a fight.

prompt_text: You enter the hangar. TIE fighters are stationed here, but stormtroopers patrol the area. Do you attempt to steal a ship or hide in the cargo?

passing_attributes.Piloting: You successfully steal a TIE fighter and fly out of the hangar, escaping the Star Destroyer.
passing_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You sense the right moment to slip into the cargo hold, hiding from the stormtroopers.

partial_pass_attributes.Dexterity: You manage to avoid detection, but you can't find a clear way out yet.

fail.message: You are spotted trying to steal a ship, and stormtroopers open fire.

prompt_text: You find yourself at the bridge. You have a chance to disable the Star Destroyer entirely or take control of its systems. Do you attempt either?

passing_attributes.Hacking: You shut down all systems, rendering the Star Destroyer helpless in space.
passing_attributes.Piloting: You seize control of the ship and set a new course for a Rebel base.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You take out some of the key officers but fail to gain full control.

fail.message: You fail to take control, and alarms blare across the ship. Reinforcements are on the way!

prompt_text: You arrive at Reactor Core Alpha. Security is tight here. Do you attempt to sneak past the guards or create a distraction?

passing_attributes.Stealth: You successfully sneak past the guards and reach the reactor core.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You create a distraction by triggering false alarms in another section of the ship.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You engage in a quick firefight and manage to take out the guards, but reinforcements are on the way.

fail.message: You are spotted by guards and forced into a heavy firefight. Alarms go off across the ship!

prompt_text: You’ve reached Reactor Core Beta. The area is full of maintenance droids. Do you disable the droids or try to blend in?

passing_attributes.Hacking: You disable the maintenance droids, clearing the way to the reactor.
passing_attributes.Disguise: You manage to blend in with maintenance personnel and walk undetected to the reactor core.

partial_pass_attributes.Strength: You destroy a few of the droids, but the noise attracts attention from nearby stormtroopers.

fail.message: The droids detect your presence and alert the guards. A squad of stormtroopers is en route!

prompt_text: You arrive at Reactor Core Gamma, the most secure core on the ship. The area is heavily patrolled. Do you hack the security systems or fight your way through?

passing_attributes.Hacking: You hack the security systems, shutting down surveillance and alarms in the area.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You take out the patrol guards swiftly, clearing your path to the reactor core.

partial_pass_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You sense an opportunity to slip through unnoticed, but not without alerting some guards.

fail.message: You are overwhelmed by patrols and forced into combat. Backup is on the way!

prompt_text: You’ve planted the third bomb! Now, you must escape the Star Destroyer. Do you head for the hangar to steal a ship or find an escape pod?

passing_attributes.Piloting: You successfully steal a TIE fighter and make your getaway.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You find an escape pod and launch it just as the bombs go off.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You take out a few stormtroopers but need to fight your way to the escape pod.

fail.message: You're trapped by guards and running out of time. The Star Destroyer is seconds from blowing up!
